Class ShootShockWaveCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.gamelogic.effectscreator.ShootShockWaveCreator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EffectsCreator
    public class ShootShockWaveCreator
extends java.lang.Object
implements EffectsCreator
    Creates and sets the effect that shoots around the player to targets on different squares or to all the targets.

      • run

        public java.util.ArrayList<FunctionalEffect> run​(Server server,
                                                 GameTable table,
                                                 Targets targets)
                                          throws IllegalActionException,
                                                 UnavailableUserException
        Description copied from interface: EffectsCreator
        This method is used to set and creates the effects.
        Specified by:
        run in interface EffectsCreator
        Parameters:
        server - The server where the game is running.
        table - Represents all the data of the game.
        targets - The targets of the shoots done during the turn.
        Returns:
        A list of FunctionalEffects that represent all the modification that are done on the data.
        Throws:
        IllegalActionException - The player selected an illegal action. This exception makes the turn restart.
        UnavailableUserException - The player has disconnected or didn't answer within the time limit.
